resources.string: No words sets found. Create a new words set?
Cannot delete when words set contains only two words
Word set cannot contain only one word
Word set cannot contain no words
Enter words and download the translations

string-array.name: howToContent
string-array.item: Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then click words set title you want to learn.

Press android menu button and select -Create words set- menu item. Then give your new words set a title and press -save- button. Then you may create words pairs or rename words set. Press -Save words set- after setting all words pairs you want.
Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -edit- menu item.
Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -delete- menu item.

Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -edit- menu item. Then press -Rename set- button

Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -edit- menu item. Then click on -New word- button

Press android menu button and select -Available words sets- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -edit- menu item. Then click on word you want to edit.

Press android menu button and select -Available words set- menu item. Then long click on set title you want to edit until you will see context menu. Select -edit- menu item. Then long click on word you want to delete until you will see context menu open. Click on delete menu item.
